FuncDef:
The dns-server-select-algorithm command configures the DNS server selection mode of the device.
The undo dns-server-select-algorithm command restores the default setting. The dns-server-select-algorithm command configures the DNS server selection mode of the device. The undo dns-server-select-algorithm command restores the default setting. By default, the device selects a DNS server in auto mode.

ParaDef.Info:
Selects a DNS server in fixed mode.
-

Selects a DNS server in auto mode.
-

ExtraInfo: The device selects a DNS server in either of the following modes:
